definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: QinQiong said on the spot in the future must help tang wall.
sentences.chinese: 秦瓊當場表示日後一定幫助唐壁。

sentences.english: Apply the Peak Rule only after the Peak Day is identified.
sentences.chinese: 出現排卵時即認清峯日後，才運用峯日規則。

sentences.english: So be slow to take action or to make statements you might later regret...
sentences.chinese: 因此，別急着採取行動，或發表聲明，免得日後後悔。

sentences.english: There are also two supports and connections to receive future footbridges .
sentences.chinese: 亦有兩個支座及連接點接駁日後的行人天橋。

sentences.english: Finally, I wish you all good luck and success in your career.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我謹祝各位日後工作順利，前程錦繡。

sentences.english: Don't be too single-minded. It will only serve to bind you later on.
sentences.chinese: 別太鑽牛角尖，這隻會成爲你日後的羈絆。

sentences.english: Some people thought thieves were plaiting the manes of horses they wished to steal.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲這些辮子是小偷爲日後行竊編的。

sentences.english: and in the long run, who knows how it's going to affect you.
sentences.chinese: 而且天曉得日後會有什麼後果。
那女僕打入瑪麗家爲同夥日後行竊踩點。

sentences.english: Those small exposures add up and may contribute to later-life disease.
sentences.chinese: 這些小量接觸加在一起有可能導致日後產生疾病。

sentences.english: Do you wish to receive promotional information about future Institutes?
sentences.chinese: 你希望在日後收取有關研修班的資料嗎？

sentences.english: Chanute invented the "strut-wire" braced structure that would be used in all biplanes of the future.
sentences.chinese: 夏尼特發明了適用於日後所有雙翼機的空間桁架結構。

sentences.english: My waterfall long hair turned into fashionable short hair. Later on, I will style my short hair.
sentences.chinese: 日後，我將在短髮上變些花樣。

sentences.english: Take action now to avoid that possibility later.
sentences.chinese: 現在就開始採取行動吧，省得日後追悔莫及。

sentences.english: The experiment was only partially successful, but it laid the groundwork for future research.
sentences.chinese: 此項試驗未竟全功，但爲日後的研究奠下基礎。

sentences.english: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.
sentences.chinese: 能力和威儀是她的衣服，她想到日後的景況就喜笑。

definition: in a little while/in a moment/later on
as for/as to/to go so far as to
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
